org.apache.flink.queryablestate.client.state

类 ImmutableStateBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.queryablestate.client.state.ImmutableStateBinder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    StateBinder

    public class ImmutableStateBinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateBinder
    A StateBinder used to deserialize the results returned by the QueryableStateClient.

    The result is an immutable State object containing the requested result.

        指定者:
        createAggregatingState 在接口中 StateBinder
        类型参数:
